channel.title: Pk points when dieing
channel.description:
pi source 317
Ok so when u die on my server to an npc u get 2 pk points just liek when u kill some one in the wilderness. if u die in wildy u dont get points but when u die to an npc u get pk points. also if u kill in pits u get pk points.
how can i make it so only pk points killing in wilderness
